narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Ozarks Medical Center is a Psychiatry & Neurology, Neurology provider based in West Plains, MO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $18.5M in Medicaid payments across 149K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $18.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
